data.author: Adeboye Amosu
data.title: FA Cup: Iheanacho Continues Great Form With Winner Against Wallsall
data.description: Kelechi Iheanacho scored the winning goal for the second consecutive Emirates FA Cup game as Leicester City pip League Two club, Walsall 1-0 in their fourth round tie on Saturday.It was Iheanacho's 27th goal in just 46 domestic cup outings.The forward took the place of Zambia international Patson Daka on 63 minutes.Iheanacho, who also scored in Leicester City's 1-0 victory against Gillingham in the third round fired home the winning goal in the 68th minute.The forward's 20-yard effort took a deflection off Brandon Comley before sailing into the net.He now has 17 goals in 23 FA Cup appearances....
